targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeGroupAlias(a.timestamp,$__interval),
a.source_ip, a.jobs, a.cpus 
from (
  SELECT  timestamp, CONCAT(nodes.servicetag) 
  AS nodeid, jobs, cpus, nodes.os_ip_addr AS source_ip
  FROM slurm.node_jobs a        
  INNER JOIN nodes               
  ON nodes.nodeid = a.nodeid
  WHERE $__timeFilter(a.timestamp)) 
AS a  WHERE a.source_ip IN ($NodeByUser)
GROUP BY a.timestamp, a.source_ip, a.jobs, a.cpus ORDER BY a.timestamp

SELECT
  *
FROM
  slurm.jobs
WHERE
  user_id IN ($Users)
  AND start_time < ${__to:date:seconds}
  AND end_time BETWEEN ${__from:date:seconds} and ${__to:date:seconds}

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "memory_power",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'PowerMetrics TotalMemoryPower' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "power_consumption",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'PowerMetrics SystemPowerConsumption' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "cpu_power",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'PowerMetrics TotalCPUPower' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "cpu_usage",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'SystemUsage CPUUsage' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "cpu1_temp",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'CPU1 Temp TemperatureReading' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag) 
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "cpu2_temp",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'CPU2 Temp TemperatureReading' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag) 
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "nic_temp",
CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label SIMILAR TO '% NIC 1 Port 1 Partition 1 TemperatureReading' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
avg(CAST(value AS decimal)) AS "fan1_speed",
  CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM timeseries_metrics
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.servicetag = timeseries_metrics.system
WHERE
$__timeFilter("time") AND
label= 'Fan 1A RPMReading' AND
timeseries_metrics.system in ($servicetag)
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
avg(value) AS "Memory_usage", 
CONCAT('| ',nodes.os_ip_addr) AS name
FROM slurm.memoryusage
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.nodeid = slurm.memoryusage.nodeid
WHERE
$__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
nodes.servicetag in ($servicetag) 
GROUP BY time,name
ORDER BY time

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT servicetag as __value from nodes
list.name: servicetag
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT servicetag as __value from nodes

list.definition:
SELECT
 user_id as __value, user_name as __text, nodes as IP, nodes.os_ip_addr, nodes.servicetag
FROM
  slurm.jobs
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.os_ip_addr = ANY(nodes)
WHERE nodes.servicetag in ($servicetag) AND
 start_time < ${__to:date:seconds} AND end_time > ${__from:date:seconds}
list.name: Users
list.query:
SELECT
 user_id as __value, user_name as __text, nodes as IP, nodes.os_ip_addr, nodes.servicetag
FROM
  slurm.jobs
INNER JOIN nodes
ON nodes.os_ip_addr = ANY(nodes)
WHERE nodes.servicetag in ($servicetag) AND
 start_time < ${__to:date:seconds} AND end_time > ${__from:date:seconds}

list.name: NodeByUser
